Sanitize Sample Data

Source: R/sanitizeSampleData.R
sanitizeSampleData.Rd

Sanitize Sample Data

sanitizeSampleData(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

Value

DataFrame or data.frame.

Examples

# DataFrame ====
from <- DataFrame(
    "genotype" = c("wt", "ko", "wt", "ko"),
    "batch" = c(1L, 1L, 2L, 2L),
    row.names = c("sample_1", "sample_2", "sample_3", "sample_4")
)
glimpse(from)
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:4] "sample_1" "sample_2" "sample_3" "sample_4"
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 4
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ genotype: chr [1:4] "wt" "ko" "wt" "ko"
#>   .. ..$ batch   : int [1:4] 1 1 2 2
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()
to <- sanitizeSampleData(from)
glimpse(to)
#> Formal class 'DataFrame' [package "S4Vectors"] with 6 slots
#>   ..@ rownames       : chr [1:4] "sample_1" "sample_2" "sample_3" "sample_4"
#>   ..@ nrows          : int 4
#>   ..@ listData       :List of 2
#>   .. ..$ genotype: Factor w/ 2 levels "ko","wt": 2 1 2 1
#>   .. ..$ batch   : Factor w/ 2 levels "1","2": 1 1 2 2
#>   ..@ elementType    : chr "ANY"
#>   ..@ elementMetadata: NULL
#>   ..@ metadata       : list()

# data.frame ====
from <- data.frame(
    "genotype" = c("wt", "ko", "wt", "ko"),
    "batch" = c(1L, 1L, 2L, 2L),
    row.names = c("sample_1", "sample_2", "sample_3", "sample_4"),
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)
glimpse(from)
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 2
#> $ genotype <chr> "wt", "ko", "wt", "ko"
#> $ batch    <int> 1, 1, 2, 2
to <- sanitizeSampleData(from)
glimpse(to)
#> Observations: 4
#> Variables: 2
#> $ genotype <fct> wt, ko, wt, ko
#> $ batch    <fct> 1, 1, 2, 2
